text: yep, like the Slack app for Slack :smile:
where you can easily review things from mobile (from the browser it is hard to even press +2)
<@U1AU8DRQR>: but what do you want to view?
the gerrit changesets and I would like to have a GUI to review them
oh, so gerrit.. i have no idea, i am still in the phase of puking every time i see it..
maybe search on the app store for your mobile device?
did it, and no app seemed to be the one I wanted
why does Gerrit make you still puke?
it's ugly, and the name of the links lead to places that are not what i expect
like documentation on the main page leads to gerrit documentation. imagine if wiki link on your github repo lead you to the github wiki?
